name: Inpatients
query:
SELECT 
    patient AS "Patient ID",
    patient_name AS "Patient Name",
    gender AS Gender,
    mobile AS Mobile,
    scheduled_date AS "Admission Date",
    admission_practitioner AS "Doctor",
    type AS "Department",
    room AS "Room:Data:150",
    bed AS "Bed Name:Data:150",
    status
FROM `tabInpatient Record`
WHERE status = 'admitted' ;
